aiMode: AI Mode: The computer automatically plays as the right player
privacyDescription: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have several rights regarding your personal data. You can download a copy of your data, anonymize your account, or permanently delete your account and all associated information.
exportDataDesc: You can retrieve all information related to your account by downloading a file containing your personal data.
anonymizationDesc: If you want to keep your account but remove your personal information, you can choose to anonymize your account. This action will replace your personal data with anonymous values (e.g., your name will be replaced with 'Anonymous User').
deleteAccountDescription: Deleting your account is an irreversible action. All your personal data, including your history and preferences, will be permanently removed from our system.
